T02D2820:170a-0: @170a * // dpal 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D2820:170a-1: mgon po gzhon nu sgeg khros tshul //
T02D2820:170a-2: gzhon nu gdon las rnam rgyal ba //
T02D2820:170a-3: gzhon nu skyob la phyag 'tshal nas //
T02D2820:170a-4: gzhon nu bsrung phyir 'dir bshad bya //
T02D2820:170a-5: re zhig nam langs ma thag tu kha shar du
T02D2820:170a-6: bltas te 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug thugs
T02D2820:170a-7: rje chen po dang ldan par byas la /
T02D2820:170a-8: de'i dkyil 'khor gzhon nu khros pa zhes bya ba'i sngags 'di bzlas par bya'o //
T02D2820:170a-9: aom a'a:hr'i:ku m'a ra kro dha sa rbba du sht'a
T02D2820:170a-10: na ha ra ha ra ku m'a ra ra ksha
T02D2820:170a-12: khri snyan nag po'i stan 'dug la //
T02D2820:170a-13: gzhon nu khros pa'i nga rgyal gyis //
T02D2820:170a-14: shar sogs phyogs bzhir gtum mo bzhi //
T02D2820:170a-15: rang bzhin ma yengs blta bar bya //
T02D2820:170a-16: de la lus bsrung dpa' bo gnag / zhal gsum phyag drug dkar dmar sngo //
T02D2820:170a-17: rdo rje dril bu dgra sta zhags //
T02D2820:170a-19: srog bsrung dpa' bo dmar po ste //
T02D2820:170b-0: zhal gsum @170b phyag drug sngo ser dmar //
T02D2820:170b-1: gri gug thod pa 'khor lo dbyig / rgyal mtshan mgo bo 'dzin pa nyid //
T02D2820:170b-2: stobs bsrung dpa' bo sngo ljang ser //
T02D2820:170b-3: zhal gsum phyag drug ser dmar ljang //
T02D2820:170b-4: be co na sdigs mdzub mdung tho ba //
T02D2820:170b-5: rdo rje mda' gzhu thogs pa'o //
T02D2820:170b-6: dpal bsrung dpa' bo dkar pos te //
T02D2820:170b-7: zhal gsum phyag drug sngo dmar dkar //
T02D2820:170b-8: gnam lcags khatv'am skyabs sbyin sgrom //
T02D2820:170b-9: mnyam par gzhag pas zhi zhing khro //
T02D2820:170b-10: gzhon nu'i sngon mo sngon song bas //
T02D2820:170b-11: lag tu rdo rje dril thogs shing //
T02D2820:170b-12: rkang pa rdo rje'i 'gros bskor bas //
T02D2820:170b-13: gzhon nu rab tu bsrung bar bya //
T02D2820:170b-14: lha la skyabs su 'gro ba dang //
T02D2820:170b-15: gzhan la ltos pa med nyid kyis //
T02D2820:170b-16: 'od zer rdo rje'i gur phub cing //
T02D2820:170b-17: ka p'a la yi sbyor ba brtsam //
T02D2820:170b-18: rang nyid rdo rje spar pa yis //
T02D2820:170b-19: rnal 'byor gzhon nu khros pa yi //
T02D2820:170b-20: ting nge 'dzin la brten pa dang //
T02D2820:170b-21: gzhon nu dran pa'i rgyas bskyab bya //
